Whether it’s a wide range of accommodation from luxury spaces to club rooms, Kids Clubs from 4 years to 17 years old, all-inclusive dining available at any time, a premium open bar, no fewer than sixty different sports and activities waiting for you and intimate evenings with light entertainment or live music with shows and dancing – it’s a world of almost endless possibilities. ✔ All day gourmet dining - three daily meals & all-day snacking ✔ Premium Open Bar (including wine, beer, cocktails, soft drinks, coffee) ✔ FREE Wifi ✔ Kids Clubs: Unique programs from 4-17yrs ✔ Live entertainment Flights are additional Save up to 20% off View more View less Save up to 20% off for travel dates between 30 May-26 November 26 ALL INCLUSIVE Enquire now Sale Period : Until 27 Apr 26 by 4pm or until sold out Deal Includes All day gourmet dining - three daily meals & all-day snacking Premium Open Bar (including wine, beer, cocktails, soft drinks, coffee) FREE Wi-Fi Kids Clubs: Unique programs from 4-17yrs Live entertainment Travel Period Club Med Bali - minimum stay of 3 nights . Travel between 30 May 2026 and 26 June 2026, 18 July 2026 and 07 August 2026, 29 August 2026 and 26 November 2026. Club Med Bintan and Maldives - Minimum stay of 3 nights. Travel between: 30 May-26 November 26 Club Med Kani, Maldives - Kids aged 4-11 years stays free (one child per paying adult). Minimum stay of 3 nights. Club Med Phuket - Minimum stay of 3 nights. Travel between: 30 May-26 November 26 Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings only. Offer valid for booking until 27 Apr 26. Travel is between 30 May-26 November 2026. A 20% deposit is required at time of booking. All travel must be commenced and completed as specified. If additional accommodation is required due to flight schedules this is at customers own expense • Min/max stays apply • Some surcharges, closeouts and accommodation restrictions apply. • Bedding configurations may vary on twin share options. Twin share is two adults sharing a room using existing bedding. • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and is a guide only to the overall quality of the property • Accommodation are limited and subject to availability at time of booking • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details.
